concept.title: Customer path analysis in
concept.shortdesc: provides path analysis features that help you to focus only on the customer paths that are most relevant to your business goals.

conbody.p: The following steps are an overview of the workflow for using to analyze customer paths. Begin your path analysis by submitting a path request that specifies the criteria for the paths you want to analyze. then generates a report that contains only the paths that meet your criteria.

ol.li: Configure a path report to specify the criteria for the paths you want to analyze.

conbody.p: You can choose from various views of the results to focus your analysis. For example, you can focus on the most common customer behaviors, sequences of customer interactions, or path duration.
